text: Nigel Starmer-Smith (born 25 December 1944)Nigel Starmer Smith rugby player profile Scrum.com is a British former international rugby union player, rugby journalist and commentator. He was born in Cheltenham, England. Starmer-Smith played for the England national rugby union team between 1969 until 1971. In 2015, Starmer-Smith was diagnosed with dementia.England legend Nigel Starmer- Smith's son describes the terrifying speed with which dementia stole his father away ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:English rugby league players Category:English journalists Category:English sports commentators Category:Sportspeople from Gloucestershire
title: Nigel Starmer-Smith
